item.description: Left handed Gretsch Tennesee Rose with bigsby. This guitar has been thoroughly gigged for over fifteen years. Had a professional fret level and dress, along with a pinned bridge (no longer free floating). Pickups upgraded to TV Jones Classic filtertrons. Original hardshell case included. No trades.

item.title: 1980 Lefty Guild D40C with K&K Pickup - $1,100 (Murray Hill)
item.description: 1980 Guild D40C (Left-Handed), rare cutaway model, solid condition with play wear consistent with a player guitar of this vintage, string action is excellent (3/64" to 4/64" high E to Low E at the 12th fret - saddle height is 1/8"), equipped with a K&K Pure Mini bridge plate transducer pickup, sturdy hardshell case with locking keys, $1,100.

item.title: LEFTY LEFT HANDED FENDER JAGUAR MADE IN JAPAN WITH JOHNNY MARR CASE - $2,000 (Belmont NH USA)
item.description: Here is my hardly played left handed made in Japan Fender Jaguar in white with matching headstock. I believe from the serial number this is a 2019 model. The guitar is completely original. The only addition to the appearance of the guitar is the addition of reproduction Jaguar decals to the original Fender decal on the headstock. There are a few very slight scuffs in the paint (see photos). The case is a Fender Johnny Marr Jag case that was very hard for me to find separately and has been professionally modified into a left handed oriented case. The lefty Jag fits perfectly into this case. This Jag is beautiful to look at and plays perfectly. $2000 obo. Note: Phone calls or e-mail only - I only have a land line only - I do not text. I am in the Lakes Region of New Hampshire. Thank you for looking.

item.title: USA LEFTY Gibson les paul - $400 (Milford)
item.description: I've had this guitar for over ten years and Its hard to let go but do to a hand injury and bills I have to let it go. It's a incredible guitar and I hope someone else enjoys it as much as I did

item.title: 2 Electronic Guitars & Amps - $125
item.description: Selling a child sized electric guitar and a lefty regular sized guitar, amp and guitar case.

item.title: LEFT-HANDED ES 335 - $200 (Hampton)
item.description: Lefty ES335 GROTE with epi pro pick ups and plug in harness. Push pull coil spilters Out put on the rim of the guitar with old epi case. $ 200

item.title: Left handed guitars for SALE or TRADE Kramer, Ibanez, ESP - $475
item.description: I have a few really cool and rare LEFTY guitars for sale. I have a Kramer Pacer Imperial from 1982-83' good shape for the year. Comes with original Kramer case. Has headstock repair, but it is SOLID. Next is a tiger stripe Kramer Pacer/Baretta clone, maple body, EMG pickup , real floyd rose. All great parts. comes with case. Ibanez RG440 with factory case. Has some dings, but what a fantastic guitar!!! ESP LTD Viper 400 refinished in custom sky blue. All of these are fantastic playing instruments. I just have a lot right now and still have several projects I am working on....so now somebody else will be able to enjoy them. I am open to trades, partial trades. I love amps, riding lawn mowers, guns, GM truck stuff.... Let me know. Thank you for looking
